description:
Computes the inverse hyperbolic cosine of `x`. It is the inverse function of the hyperbolic cosine so that *`arcosh(cosh(x)) = x`*.

The no-data value `null` is passed through and therefore gets propagated. `NaN` is returned for values outside of the allowed range.

returns.description: The computed hyperbolic angle in radians in the range *[0, +∞)*.

links.title: Inverse hyperbolic cosine explained by Wolfram MathWorld
